channel.title: D3js on Stencilled
channel.description: Recent content in D3js on Stencilled

item.title: States to Shapes
item.author: senthil.thyagarajan@gmail.com (Senthil Thyagarajan)
item.description: I started working on this visualation after coming across Mike Bostock's shape tweening bl.ock , which was done for one state. The source for this data is Insurance Institute for Highway Service(IIHS). The size of the square is based on the motor vehicle deaths per 100,000 people(2015). body { margin: 0; font-family: "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif; } .state-path { fill: #ccc; stroke: #fff; stroke-width: 5px; } .state-label { font-size: .

item.title: Harry Potter Characters.
item.author: senthil.thyagarajan@gmail.com (Senthil Thyagarajan)
item.description: Across 7 books/ 8 movies there are so many characters in this series by J.K Rowling. For this project I have got the data from data.world. All files here were combined to create a json with nodes and links. Using d3js I have visualized the characters connected to each other. .link { fill: none; stroke-width: 0.5px; } .link.win{ stroke: #a6d96a; } .link.loss{ stroke: #ca0020; } .node text { pointer-events: none; font: 10px sans-serif; } //Constants for the SVG var width = 1080, height = 900; //Set up the colour scale var color = d3.

item.title: Indian Premier League so far.
item.author: senthil.thyagarajan@gmail.com (Senthil Thyagarajan)
item.description: Indian Premier League(IPL) has had 13 different teams over the past ten years. In this project I have tried to visualize how these teams have performed over the years. svg text{ fill:grey; font-size:11px; } svg .values text{ pointer-events:none; stroke-width: 0.5px; } item.title: Where do people eat in Austin ??
item.author: senthil.thyagarajan@gmail.com (Senthil Thyagarajan)
item.description: Recently I visited Austin and many of my friends had mentioned about the variety in food options here. So my wife and I decided to search for places to eat on the foursquare app. As a standard search filter with high rating we ended up at pretty good places and foursquare did alert us to checkins whenever we reached a place. Post the trip I wanted to see how many people do checkins using this app and how the checkins are correlated with the ratings.

item.title: NFL Season 2016-17
item.author: senthil.thyagarajan@gmail.com (Senthil Thyagarajan)
item.description: Hello World !!! This is my first project using d3js. Being a GIS professional, visualization is always a part of job. I always wanted to learn different ways for visualizing data.Let it be a simple plot using R or a choropleth map using Arcmap . In this project I am trying to display how the NFL season 2016-17 went about. Ofcourse was surprised to see the Cowboys doing so well. May be we got our own Tom Brady.
